Press & Awards

Coral Gables Special Member Recognition - 2016

We have received the special member recognition from Coral Gables Chamber of Commerce to have developed a variety of programs for the Coral Gables business community.

Knight of The Year - 2016

The Knight of the Year is an award presented to the most outstanding Knight for the fraternal year which ends June 30th of each year.

Global Peace Chapter Founder Recognition - 2016

This important international award has been received to have promoted social cohesion and mitigate religious and ethnic divisions through our events.

A+ Rating, Better Business Bureau - 2016

Best Miami Weddings has earned an A rating by the Better Business Bureau. The BBB bases this grade on information about Best Miami Weddings and feedback from our customers. A business that receives an A rating means they meet the qualifying factors, which include integrity and performance.

Burgerliscious Participant - 2015

We were excited to participate in the 2015 Burgerliscious competition here in Coral Gables back in November. The top 20 restaurants, incluiding our executive chef, battled for the right to call their burger the best.

US Commerce Association - 2012

We have been selected for the 2011 Miami Award in the Venues & Event Spaces category by the US Commerce Association (USCA).

WeddingWire Rated 2011 - 2016

We have a 4.5 star rating out of 5 stars on WeddingWire, and have been positively reviewed over 100 times by past satisfied clients.

Coral Glabes Chamber of Commerce - 2015

Since 2015, we have been proud members of the Coral Gables Chamber of Commerce. We support our commnunity and local businesses.

Wedding Wire Rated - 2016

We have received the WeddingWire Couples' Choice AwardÂ® for 2016, as determined by reviews from our clients! The Couples' Choice Awards recognizes our business as amongst the top 5% of wedding professionals nationwide.
